name: SWOT Analysis
description: Strategic planning tool to analyze Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, and Threats in making business decisions

structure.name: Strengths
structure.description: Internal advantages and capabilities that give competitive edge

structure.name: Weaknesses
structure.description: Internal limitations and vulnerabilities that need improvement

structure.name: Opportunities
structure.description: External factors that could be advantageous for growth

structure.name: Threats
structure.description: External factors that could cause problems or hinder success

structure.name: Strategic Implications
structure.description: Analysis of how SWOT factors interact and what they mean for strategy

prompts: What are our key internal strengths and competitive advantages?
What are our main weaknesses or areas needing improvement?
What external opportunities exist in our market or industry?
What external threats or challenges do we face?
How should we leverage our strengths to address threats and seize opportunities?
What strategic priorities emerge from this SWOT analysis?
when_to_use: Annual business reviews and goal setting
when_not_to_use: Highly technical or engineering decisions with clear parameters
Urgent operational decisions requiring immediate action
Simple choices with minimal strategic implications

examples.title: New Market Entry Strategy
examples.description: Using SWOT to evaluate entering a new geographical market with existing products

examples.title: Product Line Expansion
examples.description: Analyzing strengths and opportunities before launching new product categories

examples.title: Competitive Response Strategy
examples.description: Assessing competitive threats and opportunities when a rival launches new features

validation_status.validation_notes: Widely validated strategic planning tool used globally for decades

prerequisites: Basic understanding of your organization's capabilities
Awareness of market and competitive landscape
Clear strategic question or decision to be made
